chart_description: This chart monitors the latency in milliseconds for pinging Redis server. It helps in detecting network or server issues affecting the performance of the Redis server.

dimension_descriptions.avg: This dimension measures the average latency in seconds for pinging Redis server.
dimension_descriptions.max: This dimension measures the maximum latency in seconds for pinging Redis server.
dimension_descriptions.min: This dimension measures the minimum latency in seconds for pinging Redis server.
